snippet: The Danish toymaker Lego said revenue soared 11 percent in the first six months of 2014, mostly because of the success of “The Lego Movie.”
lead_paragraph: The Danish toymaker Lego said revenue soared 11 percent in the first six months of 2014, mostly because of the success of “The Lego Movie.”

headline.main: Revenue Soars at Lego in First Half of Year
headline.print_headline: Revenue Soars at Lego In First Half of Year
